languages.text: Враги Человечества обосновались в замерзшем улье, превратив останки умирающего мира в свой полигон для пыток. Дабы сберечь то, что осталось, Вольному Торговцу необходимо понять намерения ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: Враги Человечества обосновались в замерзшем улье, превратив останки умирающего мира в свой полигон для пыток. Дабы сберечь то, что осталось, Вольному Торговцу необходимо понять намерения ксеносов.

languages.text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.
languages.original_text: Враги Человечества обосновались в замерзшем улье, превратив останки умирающего мира в свой полигон для пыток. Дабы сберечь то, что осталось, Вольному Торговцу необходимо понять намерения ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

languages.text: 人类之敌已经在冰冷的巢都中扎了根，把这个垂死的世界变成了他们试验酷刑的屠宰场。行商浪人必须弄清这些异形的目的，才能保护这个世界残存下来的一切。
languages.original_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

traits.locale_text: 人类之敌已经在冰冷的巢都中扎了根，把这个垂死的世界变成了他们试验酷刑的屠宰场。行商浪人必须弄清这些异形的目的，才能保护这个世界残存下来的一切。

languages.text: 人類の敵は凍りついたハイヴに住み着き、滅びゆく惑星に残った者たちを拷問実験場に変えた。残っている者たちを守るために、自由開拓者は異種族の意図を理解しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

traits.locale_text: 人類の敵は凍りついたハイヴに住み着き、滅びゆく惑星に残った者たちを拷問実験場に変えた。残っている者たちを守るために、自由開拓者は異種族の意図を理解しなければならない。

languages.text: Los enemigos de la Humanidad se han instalado en la colmena helada para convertir los restos del mundo moribundo en su laboratorio de métodos de tortura. Para preservar lo poco que queda, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe comprender las intenciones de los xenos.
languages.original_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos de la Humanidad se han instalado en la colmena helada para convertir los restos del mundo moribundo en su laboratorio de métodos de tortura. Para preservar lo poco que queda, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe comprender las intenciones de los xenos.

languages.text: Feinde der Menschheit haben sich in der vereisten Makropole eingenistet und verwandeln die Reste der sterbenden Welt in ihr eigenes Folterparadies. Um zu retten, was übrig ist, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Absichten der Xenos verstehen.
languages.original_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

traits.locale_text: Feinde der Menschheit haben sich in der vereisten Makropole eingenistet und verwandeln die Reste der sterbenden Welt in ihr eigenes Folterparadies. Um zu retten, was übrig ist, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Absichten der Xenos verstehen.

languages.text: Des ennemis de l'humanité se sont installés dans la ruche gelée, transformant les vestiges de ce monde à l'agonie en un centre de torture et d'expériences. Pour préserver ce qu'il en reste, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit comprendre les intentions des xénos.
languages.original_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

traits.locale_text: Des ennemis de l'humanité se sont installés dans la ruche gelée, transformant les vestiges de ce monde à l'agonie en un centre de torture et d'expériences. Pour préserver ce qu'il en reste, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit comprendre les intentions des xénos.

languages.text: İnsanlığın düşmanları, donmuş kovana kurulmuş ve ölen dünyanın kalıntılarını kendi işkence deneme alanlarına dönüştürmüşler. Kalan şeyleri koruyabilmek adına Hür Tacir, zenoların niyetinin ne olduğunu anlamak zorunda.
languages.original_text: Enemies of Humanity have installed themselves in the frozen hive, turning the remnants of the dying world into their own torture testing ground. To preserve what is left, the Rogue Trader must understand the xenos' intentions.

traits.locale_text: İnsanlığın düşmanları donmuş kovana kurulmuşlar ve ölen dünyanın kalıntılarını kendi pilot işkence bölgelerine dönüştürmüşler. Kalan şeyleri koruyabilmek adına Hür Tacir, zenoların niyetinin ne olduğunu anlamak zorunda.
